<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The utility class that helps computing the index of the object inside trie</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from its hash. The generator can be configured with the number of bits</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// used for each level of trie structure with \\c NumRootsBits and \\c</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// NumSubtrieBits.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For example, try computing indexes for a 16-bit hash 4660 with 8-bit root</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and 4-bit sub-trie:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///   IndexGenerator IndexGen&#123;8, 4, Hash&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///   size&#95;t index1 = IndexGen.next(); // index 18 in root node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///   size&#95;t index2 = IndexGen.next(); // index 3 in sub-trie level 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///   size&#95;t index3 = IndexGen.next(); // index 4 in sub-tire level 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is used by different trie implementation to figure out where to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// insert/find the object in the data structure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator">TrieHashIndexGenerator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// information of the hash in current level. For example, if the object is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Drop all the bits before StartBit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a>.drop&#95;front(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> / 8u);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> %= 8u;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the index using the bits in range &#91;StartBit, StartBit + NumBits),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// note the range can spread across few &#96;uint8&#95;t&#96; in the array.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint8&#95;t Byte : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ByteStart = 0, ByteEnd = 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">        ByteStart = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">        Byte &amp;= (1u &lt;&lt; (8 - <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>)) - 1u;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurrentNumBits = ByteEnd - ByteStart;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrentNumBits &gt; NumBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">        Byte &gt;&gt;= CurrentNumBits - NumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">        CurrentNumBits = NumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      Index &lt;&lt;= CurrentNumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">      Index |= Byte &amp; ((1u &lt;&lt; CurrentNumBits) - 1u);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBits &gt;= CurrentNumBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumBits -= CurrentNumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NumBits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLVM&#95;ADT&#95;TRIEHASHINDEXGENERATOR&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
